mapper.insert: insert into general_meeting (general_id, assemblyman_id, update_tag, meeting_id, meeting_order, meeting_dttm, attend_status) values(#{general_id}, #{assemblyman_id}, #{update_tag}, #{meeting_id}, #{meeting_order}, #{meeting_dttm}, #{attend_status})
mapper.update: update general_meeting set assemblyman_id=#{assemblyman_id}, update_tag=#{update_tag}, meeting_order=#{meeting_order}, meeting_dttm=#{meeting_dttm}, attend_status=#{attend_status} where general_id=#{general_id}
